page.title: 05Closing of Stanton School
page.content: {Stanton School} finally closed with 23 pupils on 22nd July 1983 after being in use for 116 years.It was like many small rural schools in Staffordshire, falling rolls made it uneconomic. Most of the children transferred to Henry Prince First School in Mayfield taken there by taxi each morning and return to Stanton later in the day. The first news of the closure came in ctober 1981. Despite pressure during the following year from the local M.P., School Managers and Parents the closure was confirmed on 14th April 1983. An Open Evening was held on July 1983. Many old pupils attended and were treated to a wonderful display of past a present school work along with many old photographs and souvenirs of a much valued place of education.
